channel.title: [508] How do you alter player rights?
channel.description:
Ok, I'll be blunt:
I'm a noob at coding, and I want to work on a 508 server. But... I don't know how to change my account to mod / admin / whatever else there is...
Anyone willing to help out a noob?

item.title: [508] How do you alter player rights?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“xweetok599, post:2, topic:338326”]Offtopic:
Well, at first: I should begin with a 317, i heard more people will play it, and not only that. 317 is easier to code. A noob at coding can’t begin with a 508.

Ontopic:
Login.java. I think it is in the map io. Search for p.rights Change the username you see to your nickname.[/quote]Map io? Lol?

But that is one way to change it. Another way to change it is to head over to your character files and open it with WORDPAD (not notepad) and then find the ‘rights=0’ and change it to ‘rights=2’.

Read full topic
item.source: [508] How do you alter player rights?
